name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Republic Helper: Free AI assistant with ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Privacy preserving AI web copilot that helps you read and write in webpages in any language, start using in free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing AI Republic Helper: Your Best Privacy Preserving AI web Assistant!

Meet AI Republic Helper, the ultimate Chrome extension for seamless reading and writing in over 35 languages, powered by ChatGPT. Perfect for professionals, students, travelers, and content creators, this tool integrates directly into any web app—whether it's Gmail, LinkedIn, or social media—allowing you to communicate effortlessly across languages without leaving your browser.

Key features include:
- 35+ Language Support: Write and translate content in major global languages.
- Instant Rephrasing and Suggestions: Get smart suggestions to make your writing clear and natural.
- ChatGPT-Powered: Enjoy advanced, context-aware AI assistance.
- Smart Reading Assistance: Translate, summarize, and understand content instantly.
- Free to Use: Begin with free access to explore all essential features.

AI Republic Helper is designed with privacy in mind, ensuring secure and confidential use. We don’t store any personal chat history, and we never access your browsing data when the tool is not in use.

Start breaking down language barriers effortlessly—install AI Republic Helper today for a smoother, smarter online communication experience!
